alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 11:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT HUDSON...SOUTHEASTERN BERGEN... SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER...BRONX AND NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Lee, or over Ridgefield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, New Rochelle, Mott Haven, East Tremont, Hackensack, Bergenfield, Ridgefield, Dobbs Ferry, Midtown Manhattan, Harlem, Riverdale, Fort Lee, Englewood, Scarsdale, and Oradell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
